welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Great Sankey, a charming town known for its beautiful green spaces and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and departure gates.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is dedicated to low-cost airlines and offers a more streamlined travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and holiday destinations.

wifi.note: Free unlimited WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
